name: PixelSurgeon
description:
The point of this game was to teach the gamer about something without making the game boring so we created a game about the human anatomy. In this game the gamer can read about all the different body parts and learn where all these parts are placed in the human body. This game was created in about one week where I programmed mostly all the game mechanics.

A short game about the human anatomy

  • Anatomy
  • Easy to understand

Credits:

  • Maximiliam Rosén(website):  Lead Programmer
  • Andreas Berzelius: Programmer / Sound
  • Line Skaraas: Artist
